body: Mostapha, Thanks for the response, I did as you suggested, made every surface planar and recalled de HBHive and still it does not seem to work, apparently all the curved that form the geometry are taken into account but the surfaces are not.  What could be the problem? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5ihJsFRcOvNGeQczlg3kaE2l856qjRQJ3VMcYDxzRRpPyzLoOZwRine1B-TCHr0OQ5pB5ABOVpK5LEvXJgx5MvskFg7cBPez/planarsrfhivetrue.png)
